text: right Leons Līdums (born 1957) is a Latvian politician.www.cvk.lv He was a Deputy of the 9th Saeima and is a member of the People's Party. ==References== Category:Deputies of the Saeima Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People's Party (Latvia) politicians Category:21st-century Latvian politicians
title: Leons Līdums
